problem_name: Predictive Modeling for Financial Time Series Forecasting
description: This problem involves using historical financial data to predict future market trends, such as stock prices. It is crucial for developing trading strategies and making informed investment decisions.
you_have_this_if: You need to predict stock prices based on historical data.
You want to implement a trading strategy that adapts to market conditions.
You are dealing with high-frequency trading data.

approaches.technique: RNNs, LSTMs, CNNs, Autoencoders, GNNs, Transformers, Reinforcement Learning hybrids
approaches.best_for: When you need to model complex temporal dependencies in financial data.
approaches.key_tradeoff: While powerful, these models can be computationally intensive and require large datasets.

decision_matrix.technique: RNNs, LSTMs, CNNs, Autoencoders, GNNs, Transformers, Reinforcement Learning hybrids
decision_matrix.best_when: You have a large dataset and need to capture complex patterns in time series data.

start_here: Start with RNNs or LSTMs for their ability to handle sequential data effectively, especially if you have a moderate amount of historical data.
